TopicTitle: How to get rid of that weird flame?

Articles.Content:
I have a problem that causes a weird engine flame somewhere around my spaceraft. I use mods, but I also uninstalled the mod that created that flame and it's still there. Any ideas what to do now?

I primarily use RSS with the SSRSS Textures (cuz there's no download link available for extreme texture overhaul) and Real Plume.

Mods that can't cause that bug: Textures Unlimited; any parts mod

You see that flame right under the spacecraft
Looks like ans issue with engine plume....Maybe real plume is bugging it?
